question: Yesterday I was put on strict pelvic rest and bed rest. I have been having contractions every two mins but my cervix is still long thick and closed which is a good thing!! I was put on procardia and visarul to try to stop contractions so far I have felt no pain. This is my 3rd pregnancy. I had my first daughter at 29 weeks due to severe preeclampsia. My second was full term but traumatic delivery due to low blood platets. Both are now healthy and bIg :)....I have lots of cramping and constant back pain. Anyone else goung through the same this early in pregnancy?  Please share your stories :) expectIng a baby boy due march 20th !!
title: 26 weeks preterm contractions/bed rest
